Html:
Hello. I can not create pdf file with cyrilic symbols (windows-1251).
Function

iconv ("windows-1251", "utf-8", "Текст")); does not work.

This bug was reported here:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=6742

So far there seems to be no solution to this. Are there packages for generating PDF via PHP other that FPDF and UFPDF that might support PHPExcel?
